channel.title: about-me on Thieu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in about-me on Thieu's Blog

item.description: About Me Hello everyone, I’m Thieu Nguyen. Currently, I’m a master student (2nd years) in computer science of Hanoi University of Science and Technology (HUST), Hanoi, Vietnam. I’m in love with writing but also very lazy, so I create this blog. This blog basically about my process of studying or saving my thoughts when something happens to me. Hope you have such a good time here. I will make you smile when you read about my story!
